caption.p: Protective effect of NC-5 on mice infected with A/FM/1/47 (H1N1) virus. The ICR mice were infected with influenza A virus (8 × LD 50), and ten mice in each group received placebo, NC-5 or oseltamivir phosphate (OS) twice daily for 5 days. ( A) Survival rate. ( B) Body weight. On day 5 p.i., five mice per group were sacrificed for lung pathology examinations. ( C) Lung index. ( D) Histological lung injury scores of mice in each group. ( E) H & E staining of lung tissues ( n = 5). Data are presented as the mean ± S.D. of three independent experiments, * p <0.05, ** p <0.01, *** p <0.001 compared with the placebo group.
